contextId.occurrenceNote: Since these were God's words to Pharaoh, it can also be translated with the first person. Alternate translation: "The cedar trees in my garden were not as great as that tree" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-123person]])
contextId.glQuote: Cedars in the garden of God could not equal it

contextId.occurrenceNote: Since Yahweh is speaking this can be stated in first person. Alternate translation: "Therefore, this is what I, Yahweh the Lord, say" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-123person]])
contextId.glQuote: Therefore the Lord Yahweh says this
